import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './TouristPlaces.css'; const TouristPlaces = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('uttarakhand'); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const touristPlacesData = { uttarakhand: { title: "Uttarakhand - Dev Bhoomi Destinations", places: [ { name: "Rishikesh", category: "spiritual", rating: 4.8, altitude: "372m", bestTime: "Oct-Mar, Jun-Jul", activities: ["River Rafting", "Bungee Jumping", "Yoga Retreats", "Temple Visits", "Ganga Aarti"], description: "World capital of Yoga and gateway to the Himalayas, famous for spiritual experiences and adventure sports.", highlights: ["Laxman Jhula", "Ram Jhula", "Triveni Ghat", "Beatles Ashram", "Parmarth Niketan"], accommodation: ["Luxury resorts", of Char Dham pilgrimage sites.", highlights: ["Ancient Shiva temple", "Mandakini river", "Gandhi Sarovar", "Vasuki Tal", "Chorabari glacier"], accommodation: ["Dharamshalas", "Guesthouses", "Tent accommodations"], transport: "14km trek from Gaurikund, Helicopter services available", icon: "üèõÔ∏è" }, { name: "Jim Corbett National Park", category: "wildlife", rating: 4.6, altitude: (skiing), Apr-Jun (sightseeing)", activities: ["Skiing", "Cable Car", "Trekking", "Camping", "Snow Activities"], description: "Premier skiing destination offering panoramic views of Himalayan peaks.", highlights: ["Asia's longest cable car", "Nanda Devi views", "Artificial lake", "Ski slopes", "Gurso Bugyal"], accommodation: ["Ski resorts", "GMVN hotels", "Camps", "Guesthouses"], transport: "16km ["Tea houses", "Mountain lodges", "Camping", "Luxury lodges"], transport: "Flight to Lukla, 14-day trek from Lukla", icon: "üèîÔ∏è" }, { name: "Kathmandu Valley", category: "cultural", rating: 4.5, adventure activities, gateway to Annapurna region.", highlights: ["Phewa Lake", "Annapurna range views", "Davis Falls", "Gupteshwor Cave", "World Peace Pagoda"], accommodation: ["Lake view resorts", "Boutique hotels", "Backpacker hostels", "Luxury properties"], transport: "200km from Kathmandu, Domestic airport, Tourist bus services", icon: "üåä" }, { name: "Annapurna Circuit", category: "Sunrise Views"], description: "Classic long-distance trek through diverse landscapes and cultural regions.", highlights: ["Thorong La Pass", "Muktinath Temple", "Manang valley", "Marsyangdi river", "Diverse ecosystems"], accommodation: ["Tea houses", "Mountain lodges", "Camping options", "Local homestays"], transport: "Start from Besisahar or Nayapul, 15-20 day circuit trek", icon: "ü•æ" }, { name: "Chitwan National Park", category: "wildlife", rating: 4.6, altitude: "150m", bestTime: "Oct-Mar", activities: ["Jungle Safari", "Elephant Rides", "Bird Watching", "Canoe Rides", "Cultural icon: "üèîÔ∏è" }, { key: "nature", name: "Nature", icon: "üåø" }, { key: "hill-station", name: "Hill Stations", icon: "üèûÔ∏è" }, { key: "wildlife", name: "Wildlife", icon: "ü¶å" }, { key: "cultural", name: "Cultural", icon: "üèõÔ∏è" } ]; const getFilteredPlaces = () => { const places = touristPlacesData[activeTab].places; if (selectedCategory === 'all') return places; return places.filter(place => place.category === selectedCategory); }; return (

üèîÔ∏è Tourist Places & Travel Guide

)}

üéí Travel Tips & Planning Guide

üóìÔ∏è Best Time to Visit

Plan your trip according to weather patterns: Summer (Mar-Jun) for pleasant weather, Monsoon (Jul-Sep) for flowers, Winter (Oct-Feb) for snow activities.

üéí Packing Essentials

Carry warm clothes, rain gear, sturdy shoes, sunscreen, first aid kit, and proper identification. High altitude areas require additional preparation.

üè• Health & Safety

Acclimatize properly for high altitudes, stay hydrated, inform someone about your plans, carry emergency contacts, and respect local customs.

üí∞ Budget Planning

Costs vary by season and destination. Budget for accommodation, transport, food, permits, guides, and emergency funds. Book in advance during peak seasons.

); }; export default TouristPlaces;
